para.text: Within one year of the applicability date of this act, and by June 1 of every subsequent year, DOES, in consultation with DSLBD, shall submit a report on the operations of the IIEP to the Mayor and the Council.
Subject to subsection (c) of this section, the report shall include, at a minimum:
The number of businesses formed and launched by IIEP participants;
The number of businesses formed by IIEP participants that have sustained operations for at least 12 months following their launch; and
Recommendations on how to improve the IIEP and ensure its sustainability.
IIEP participants may expressly authorize that their anonymity be preserved in the report.
